name: The Crisper Whisperer: Jícama, Black Bean and Corn Salad
description: Note: You may know Carolyn Cope as Umami Girl. She stops by on Tuesdays with ideas on preparing fruits and vegetables. [Photograph: Carolyn Cope] More Whispers How to Glaze Root Vegetables » Stracciatella Soup with Spinach » All Crisper Whisperer...
recipeIngredient: 1 clove garlic, smashed to a paste with a big pinch of salt
1 cup corn kernels (frozen is fine), boiled until just tender and drained
1 can (15-ounce) black beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the garlic paste, lime zest and juice, orange juice, cumin, Sriracha, and olive oil.

Add the corn, bell pepper, beans, jicama, avocado, scallions, and cilantro, and toss gently to combine. Taste for seasoning and add additional salt, pepper, and Sriracha to taste. Serve as a light meal or a side dish.
